channel.title: Linux Sound has taken a shit!
channel.description:
I installed Ubuntu on my laptop. Before, when It was Vista, the sound was great. Now, with Ubuntu, the sound is laggy as fuck. Anyone know how to fix?
Laptop is a HP Pavilion Entertainment PC dv7. 4GB Ram with 320 SATA HDD. Know a solution, let me know. I want fucking sound.

item.title: Linux Sound has taken a shit!
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

I had found this driver for my computer: http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/softwareDownloadIndex?softwareitem=ob-65609-1&lc=en&dlc=en&cc=us&product=3795434&os=2100&lang=en

It is for Vista, though. Any one know where I can find for Linux?

Read full topic
item.source: Linux Sound has taken a shit!

item.title: Linux Sound has taken a shit!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Try and find out what sound card (intergrated) you have a try to manually install the drivers for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux Sound has taken a shit!
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:1, topic:285465”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=377235.msg2841228#msg2841228 date=1245987120]
What do you mean by ‘the sound is laggy’ and what program are you using? Is it the same with all of them or just some?
[/quote]oh hai mopar[/quote]
Dude, unless you got some suggestions, gtfo my thread… I need help, not spam.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux Sound has taken a shit!
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

Moparisthebest:

What do you mean by ‘the sound is laggy’ and what program are you using? Is it the same with all of them or just some?

I installed Ubuntu. And any program that has sound has like a lag effect on the sound. It goes for video aswell. The speed of the file goes extremely slow… Its real sluggish.
